translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まずは１回最期まで進めてみましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's try progressing to the very end once first.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、クリア後にまたお会いしましょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, let's meet again after you clear it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぜひランスの物語を最期までクリアしてね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please make sure to clear Rance's story until the very end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 補足・・・ 他、何か必要なヒントがあれば追加
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Supplement... Add any other necessary hints if needed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宝箱を気にしすぎない、キャラが増える宝箱欲しいですが、じっと我慢
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't worry too much about treasure chests; although you'd want chests that add new characters, just endure patiently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 体力の回復を優先した方がいいです、うんぬん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's better to prioritize recovering health, and so on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス０１　−光を求めて−
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance 01 - In Search of Light -

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １９８９年発売　（２０１３年リメイク版０１）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Released in 1989 (2013 Remake Version 01)
640×400, 16 colors, PC-98 and others

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が儘でエロ大好きな駆け出しの冒険者ランス君
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, a selfish and lecherous fledgling adventurer

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とその奴隷シィルちゃんの冒険です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and his slave girl Sheila's adventure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大国リーザスの城下町でギルドから仕事を受けます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They accept a job from the guild in the castle town of the great nation Leazas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パリス学園に在学中に行方不明になったヒカルという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A girl named Hikaru went missing while attending Paris Academy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女の子を見つける事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their task is to find that girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは、城下町で情報収集
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance gathers information in the castle town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルは、学生に変装してパリス学園で情報収集
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheila disguises herself as a student and collects information at Paris Academy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謎の忍者(かなみ)に命を狙われたり…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are targeted for assassination by a mysterious ninja (Kanami)...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 盗賊団をアジトに侵入して壊滅させたり…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They infiltrate a bandit gang's hideout and wipe them out...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 町の女の子を襲ったり…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They assault girls in town...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうしている内にリーザス城に入れるようになり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, they become able to enter Leazas Castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コロシアムで優勝したり…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: win the coliseum...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 墓地で幽霊退治をしたり…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: exorcise ghosts in the graveyard...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目的のヒカリは見つからないが、いろいろ目立つと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They can't find the target Hikaru, but they start standing out in various ways,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスの王女に仕事を依頼されたり…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and receive work assignments from the princess of Leazas...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キエン屋敷で幽霊を救ったり…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: rescue ghosts at the Kien mansion...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、もって黒幕がリア王女と判明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and then discover that the mastermind is Princess Ria.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げる王女と追いかけ…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They chase after the fleeing princess...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忍者(かなみ)と侍女(マリス)をやっつけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: defeat the ninja (Kanami) and the maid (Marisu).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最期は、リア王女のお仕置きレイプで処女を奪って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, they take Princess Ria's virginity during her punishment rape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: めでたし、めでたし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And so, all is well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はにほー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haniho~

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後々、関係してくる設定ポイントをまとめるよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's summarize setting points that will be relevant later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鬼畜な冒険者ランスと奴隷のシィルちゃん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The brutal adventurer Rance and his slave Sheila.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 事件を解決してリーザス王国のリア王女に惚れられる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They solve the incident and get loved by Princess Ria of the Leazas Kingdom.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王美樹、リーザス城でちょこっと出会う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Lord Miki appears briefly at Leazas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忍者かなみ、ランスを敵認識
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ninja Kanami recognizes Rance as an enemy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｒａｎｃｅ２　−反逆少女達−
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance 2 - The Rebel Girls -

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １９９０年発売（２００９年リメイク版０２）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Released in 1990 (2009 Remake Version 02)
640×400, 16 colors, PC-98 and others

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市にあるカスタムという町
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A town called Custom in the Free City.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一晩で地下に陥没した状態になってしまった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It collapsed underground overnight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４人の魔女が反乱を起こしたのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Four witches staged a rebellion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとシィルは、町を元に戻す為に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and Sheila, to restore the town,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 反乱を起こした４人の魔女の退治を依頼された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were entrusted with exterminating the four witches who rebelled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 町のさらに地下に作られた人工迷宮を攻略
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They clear an artificial labyrinth created further underground.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピラミッド迷宮で鏡のワープ…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mirror warp in the pyramid labyrinth...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルとはぐれてしまったり…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They get separated from Sheila...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幼体迷宮で囚われ拷問される女の子達…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Girls captured and tortured in the larva labyrinth...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鏡のワープ仕掛け…ゴールデンハニーとの戦い…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mirror warp mechanism... Battle with Golden Honey...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 町の女の子を襲ったりとか…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Assaulting girls in town...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔女１(マリア)を倒し処女を奪う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeat Witch 1 (Maria) and take her virginity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔女２(ミル)を倒し処女を奪う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeat Witch 2 (Mil) and take her virginity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔女３(エレノア)を倒し処女を奪う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeat Witch 3 (Elenoa) and take her virginity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最期は、魔女４(志津香)をのみという所で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally, just when they are about to only defeat Witch 4 (Shizuka),

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に悪いのは彼女達でなく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They discover that the real villains are not them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 師匠であるラギシスという事が判明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but their master, Ragisis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔女４(志津香)を追いかけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chasing after Witch 4 (Shizuka),

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 過去へ飛ぼうとしていた志津香を捕まえ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they catch Shizuka, who was trying to jump into the past.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まずは１回最期まで進めてみましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's try progressing to the very end once first.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、クリア後にまたお会いしましょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, let's meet again after you clear it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぜひランスの物語を最期までクリアしてね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please make sure to clear Rance's story until the very end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 補足・・・ 他、何か必要なヒントがあれば追加
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Supplement... Add any other necessary hints if needed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宝箱を気にしすぎない、キャラが増える宝箱欲しいですが、じっと我慢
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't worry too much about treasure chests; although you'd want chests that add new characters, just endure patiently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 体力の回復を優先した方がいいです、うんぬん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's better to prioritize recovering health, and so on.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance 01 - In Search of Light -

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １９８９年発売　（２０１３年リメイク版０１）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Released in 1989 (2013 Remake Version 01)
